article_title: Teen Pleads Guilty in Car Crash That Killed Child
article_text:
A Manhattan teenager pleaded guilty Thursday to charges that he struck and killed a 4-year-old girl with his parents’ car while fleeing police and the following year dragged a police officer who tried to pull him over.

Franklin Reyes, 18 years old, entered the pleas in State Supreme Court in Manhattan to charges of manslaughter, assault, escape and unlawful fleeing a police officer in a motor vehicle.

Under terms of a plea...
